about_the_game:
Hell Bug is a fast-paced action roguelike game, but there is a twist, there are no humans in this universe, only HELL BUGS! Before the Big Bug War happened in this earth, none of the bugs had any anomalies but the consequences of war has affected some of them and they evolved into mutant monster bugs, as we call them "HELL BUGS"!

Some normal bugs tried to survive in their nests, one of them was our brave ant soldier,he did everything he could to keep his family and nest alive. But he needs equal power to fight with the evil Hell Bugs, so collect eggs from the bosses that you defeat and raise your little Hell Bug army and fight with characters that each have unique abilities!

With precedural systems like rooms that were hand-crafted and embedded in random system, also with lots of different weaponry, you can expect to encounter ANYTHING, therefore the fun never ends! You don't die permanently in this universe because of your mutational powers, so don't be sad when you "die", grab your gun and start again to explore the world of bugs from our perspective!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-5200U
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any screen that can play a video
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Hell Bug is your classic rogue lite game with a twist of mutant bugs and building your army by raising different babies with unique abilities. Learn about the Big Bug War and mystical mutants, how they were made in secret labs with dark experiments.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
